arts.ttl: Owen Hargreaves says he will be shocked if 'extraordinary' player doesn't start for Arsenal vs Man City
'Pick them off' - How Arsenal can play into Gyokeres's hands against Man City
arts.sum: Arsenal can play into Viktor Gyokeres's hands against Manchester City on Sunday and will not fear defeat against their former perpetual nemesis, Charles Watts has told Sports Mole.

arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: Arsenal host Manchester City
arts.sum: Arsenal welcome Manchester City to the Emirates in a blockbuster Premier League clash that could shape the title race. A 2-0 Champions League win away at Athletic Club Bilbao, where super-subs Gabriel Martinelli and Leandro Trossard changed the game with goals and assists.

arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: Man City travel to take on Arsenal
arts.sum: Pep Guardiolaâ€™s side, however, arrive in strong form after back-to-back clean sheets and two statement wins â€” a 3-0 demolition of Manchester United in the derby and a solid 2-0 Champions League victory over Napoli, handing the Italian champions their first defeat of the campaign. Manchester City travel to the Emirates to face Arsenal in a massive Premier League showdown that could shape the early title race.
